name: The Death Operator
description:
The Death Operator is a Simulation game, where you acquire and control a Strike Drone that is tasked with preventing the Russian advance and destroying their bases. This project was created for the "Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2"

In the game you may expect 2 gamemodes: Campaign - which is the main gameplay and focus of the game. Freeplay - An Optional level that lets you mess around in a map full of military and civilians.

Controls: The standard WASD (W - Up, S - Down, A - Left, D - Right)
Space to shoot. And Right Mouse for moving the camera
